trans-unit.source: Represents core pieces of custom personalization state information contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary" /> object.
This class cannot be inherited.

This class represents pieces of custom state information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> object made available by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe rappresenta le informazioni sullo stato personalizzate contenute nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> oggetto reso disponibile per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: This information is used by other classes and interfaces in the personalization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni vengono utilizzate da altre classi e interfacce nell'infrastruttura di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> class.
An object of personalization data associated with the personalization scope in the <c>scope</c> parameter.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> that applies to the custom personalization information.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> class using the specified value and scope.
Note that the custom state information contained in the `value` parameter must have an associated scope as specified in the `scope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che le informazioni sullo stato personalizzate contenute nel `value` parametro deve avere un ambito associato come specificato nella `scope` parametro.

trans-unit.source: Entries in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> must explicitly indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> scope.
trans-unit.target: Voci di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> devono indicare in modo esplicito se una porzione di dati personalizzati viene considerata personalizzabile in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User> o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> ambito.

trans-unit.source: In this constructor, the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property defaults to `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo costruttore, il valore per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> valore predefinito di propriet√† `false`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="scope" /> is set to a value that is not a valid member of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />.
An object of personalization data associated with the personalization scope in the <c>scope</c> parameter.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> that applies to the custom personalization information.
A Boolean value indicating if the custom state information is sensitive and should not be exported.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> class using the provided parameters.
This constructor allows you to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> that contains data that should not be serialized in the exported Web Part format.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore consente di creare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> che contiene dati che non devono essere serializzati nel formato esportato Web Part.

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of `isSensitive` to `true`, the Web Parts export handler will not serialize the data for export.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta il valore di `isSensitive` a `true`, il gestore di esportazione di Web part non verr√† serializzati i dati per l'esportazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Boolean value that indicates if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> contains sensitive information.
<see langword="true" /> if the sensitive setting for the attribute is set; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se l'impostazione riservata per l'attributo √® impostato; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts personalization information can contain sensitive data that should not be exported to other controls.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sulla personalizzazione di Web part possono contenere dati riservati che non devono essere esportati ad altri controlli.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the Web Parts import and export process.
trans-unit.target: Questa propriet√† viene utilizzata per la Web part di importazione ed esportazione di processo.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> to `true` causes the Web Parts export handler to not serialize the data in the exported Web Part format.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> a `true` fa s√¨ che il gestore di esportazione di Web part da non serializzare i dati nel formato esportato Web Part.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.
The personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.
trans-unit.target: L'ambito di personalizzazione associato a questa voce di dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This property's effect is similar to specifying the scope associated with a public property using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: Effetto di questa propriet√† √® simile a specificare l'ambito associato a una propriet√† pubblica mediante la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to set the personalization scope of the personalization information that makes up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> instance.
trans-unit.target: √à possibile utilizzare questa propriet√† per impostare l'ambito di personalizzazione delle informazioni di personalizzazione che costituisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> istanza.

trans-unit.source: All entries must have a scope associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Tutte le voci devono essere un ambito √® associato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="scope" /> is set to a value that is not a valid member of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />.
Gets or sets the personalization state information for this entry.
An object representing personalization state information.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta le informazioni sullo stato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Note that the custom state information contained in this property must have an associated scope, specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che le informazioni sullo stato personalizzate contenute in questa propriet√† devono essere associato un ambito, specificato nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A> propriet√†.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Questa propriet√† pu√≤ essere impostata su `null`.
